# India Angel Forum - AI Context File
# https://indiaangelforum.com/llms.txt
# Last Updated: 26 January 2026

## About India Angel Forum

India Angel Forum is India's largest angel investing network connecting accredited investors with exceptional early-stage startups. We facilitate funding for high-potential companies through rigorous curation, transparent economics, and collaborative diligence.

## Organization Details

- **Operating Entity:** Kosansh Solutions Inc
- **Registered Address:** 1320 Pepperhill Ln, Fort Worth, TX 76131, United States
- **Jurisdiction:** Tarrant County, Texas, USA (corporate) | Republic of India (services)
- **Website:** https://indiaangelforum.com

## Key Statistics

- **Capital Deployed:** ₹160+ Crore
- **Active Members:** 400+ accredited angels
- **Portfolio Companies:** 40+ startups
- **Average IRR:** 27%
- **SPVs Deployed (2024):** 40+

## Services Offered

### For Investors
- Curated deal flow from top 1% of applications
- Monthly investment forums
- Due diligence resources and templates
- SPV (Special Purpose Vehicle) formation and administration
- Portfolio tracking and management tools
- Quarterly sector summits
- Pro-rata rights management

### For Founders
- Access to 400+ accredited angels
- Structured fundraising process
- Demo Day presentations
- Investor relationship management
- Founder support and mentorship

## Membership Plans

1. **Standard Member:** ₹60,000/year
   - Full access to deal flow
   - Forum participation
   - Portfolio dashboard

2. **Operator Angel:** ₹36,000/year
   - 40% discount for active operators
   - All Standard benefits
   - Priority sector access

3. **Family Office:** ₹2,50,000/year
   - Up to 3 seats
   - Dedicated relationship manager
   - Custom deal sourcing

## Investment Focus Areas

- AI / Machine Learning
- SaaS / Enterprise Software
- FinTech
- HealthTech
- Consumer Technology
- Deep Tech
- Climate Tech

## Contact

For inquiries, please visit: https://indiaangelforum.com/contact

## Legal Pages

- Terms of Service: https://indiaangelforum.com/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://indiaangelforum.com/privacy
- Code of Conduct: https://indiaangelforum.com/code-of-conduct

## Compliance

- SEBI (Alternative Investment Funds) Regulations compliant
- IT Act 2000 compliant
- DPDP Act 2023 compliant
- Grievance Officer: Roshan Shah

## Important Disclaimers

- India Angel Forum does NOT provide investment advice
- All investment decisions are made solely by individual investors
- Investing in early-stage startups involves substantial risk including complete loss of investment
- Past performance is not indicative of future results
- Information provided by founders has not been independently verified
